Hero¶

class Hero : public Character¶

Represents the player's character (Hero).

Inherits from Character and adds mana points (MP) and skill capabilities.

Public Functions

Hero(std::string name, int hp, int attackPower, int mp)¶

Constructor for Hero.

パラメータ:

  • name -- The name of the hero.

  • hp -- The initial HP.

  • attackPower -- The base attack power.

  • mp -- The initial MP.

virtual void attack(Character &target) override¶

Attacks a target character.

Overrides the base attack method to include critical hit logic or other hero-specific mechanics.

パラメータ:

target -- The character to attack.

void useSkill(const Skill &skill, Character &target)¶

Uses a skill on a target.

パラメータ:

  • skill -- The skill to use.

  • target -- The target of the skill.

void heal(int amount)¶

Heals the hero by a specified amount.

パラメータ:

amount -- The amount of HP to recover.

void recoverMp(int amount)¶

Recovers MP by a specified amount.

パラメータ:

amount -- The amount of MP to recover.

bool payMp(int amount)¶

Attempts to pay a specified amount of MP.

パラメータ:

amount -- The amount of MP to spend.

戻り値:

true if MP was sufficient and spent, false otherwise.

int getMp() const¶

Gets the current MP.

戻り値:

The current MP.

int getMaxMp() const¶

Gets the maximum MP.

戻り値:

The maximum MP.

const std::vector<Skill> &getSkills() const¶

Gets the list of skills learned by the hero.

戻り値:

A constant reference to the vector of skills.

void addSkill(const Skill &skill)¶

Adds a skill to the hero's repertoire.

パラメータ:

skill -- The skill to learn.

Private Members

int mp¶

Current Magic Points.

int maxMp¶

Maximum Magic Points.

std::vector<Skill> skills¶

List of learned skills.

Source Code

Header (include/models/Hero.h):

 1#ifndef HERO_H
 2#define HERO_H
 3
 4#include "models/Character.h"
 5#include "models/Skill.h"
 6#include <vector>
 7
 8/**
 9 * @brief Represents the player's character (Hero).
10 *
11 * Inherits from Character and adds mana points (MP) and skill capabilities.
12 */
13class Hero : public Character {
14public:
15    /**
16     * @brief Constructor for Hero.
17     *
18     * @param name The name of the hero.
19     * @param hp The initial HP.
20     * @param attackPower The base attack power.
21     * @param mp The initial MP.
22     */
23    Hero(std::string name, int hp, int attackPower, int mp);
24
25    /**
26     * @brief Attacks a target character.
27     *
28     * Overrides the base attack method to include critical hit logic or other hero-specific mechanics.
29     *
30     * @param target The character to attack.
31     */
32    void attack(Character& target) override;
33
34    /**
35     * @brief Uses a skill on a target.
36     *
37     * @param skill The skill to use.
38     * @param target The target of the skill.
39     */
40    void useSkill(const Skill& skill, Character& target);
41
42    /**
43     * @brief Heals the hero by a specified amount.
44     *
45     * @param amount The amount of HP to recover.
46     */
47    void heal(int amount);
48
49    /**
50     * @brief Recovers MP by a specified amount.
51     *
52     * @param amount The amount of MP to recover.
53     */
54    void recoverMp(int amount);
55
56    /**
57     * @brief Attempts to pay a specified amount of MP.
58     *
59     * @param amount The amount of MP to spend.
60     * @return true if MP was sufficient and spent, false otherwise.
61     */
62    bool payMp(int amount);
63
64    /**
65     * @brief Gets the current MP.
66     * @return The current MP.
67     */
68    int getMp() const;
69
70    /**
71     * @brief Gets the maximum MP.
72     * @return The maximum MP.
73     */
74    int getMaxMp() const;
75
76    /**
77     * @brief Gets the list of skills learned by the hero.
78     * @return A constant reference to the vector of skills.
79     */
80    const std::vector<Skill>& getSkills() const;
81
82    /**
83     * @brief Adds a skill to the hero's repertoire.
84     *
85     * @param skill The skill to learn.
86     */
87    void addSkill(const Skill& skill);
88
89private:
90    int mp;    ///< Current Magic Points.
91    int maxMp; ///< Maximum Magic Points.
92    std::vector<Skill> skills; ///< List of learned skills.
93};
94
95#endif // HERO_H

Implementation (src/models/Hero.cpp):

 1#include "models/Hero.h"
 2#include "utils/Dice.h"
 3#include <iostream>
 4
 5Hero::Hero(std::string name, int hp, int attackPower, int mp)
 6    : Character(name, hp, attackPower), mp(mp), maxMp(mp) {}
 7
 8void Hero::attack(Character& target) {
 9    int damage = Dice::get(attackPower - 2, attackPower + 2);
10    std::cout << name << " attacks " << target.getName() << "!" << std::endl;
11    target.takeDamage(damage);
12}
13
14void Hero::useSkill(const Skill& skill, Character& target) {
15    std::cout << name << " uses " << skill.getName() << "!" << std::endl;
16    if (skill.getType() == SkillType::ATTACK) {
17        int damage = skill.getPower(); // Fixed damage for simplicity, or could use Dice
18        target.takeDamage(damage);
19    } else if (skill.getType() == SkillType::HEAL) {
20        heal(skill.getPower());
21    }
22}
23
24void Hero::heal(int amount) {
25    hp += amount;
26    if (hp > maxHp) hp = maxHp;
27    std::cout << name << " recovered " << amount << " HP!" << std::endl;
28}
29
30void Hero::recoverMp(int amount) {
31    mp += amount;
32    if (mp > maxMp) mp = maxMp;
33}
34
35bool Hero::payMp(int amount) {
36    if (mp >= amount) {
37        mp -= amount;
38        return true;
39    }
40    return false;
41}
42
43int Hero::getMp() const {
44    return mp;
45}
46
47int Hero::getMaxMp() const {
48    return maxMp;
49}
50
51const std::vector<Skill>& Hero::getSkills() const {
52    return skills;
53}
54
55void Hero::addSkill(const Skill& skill) {
56    skills.push_back(skill);
57}
